name: Stream Avatars Mini
description:
Stream Avatars Mini is a simple streaming tool that allows you to interact with your audience. Not only does it have tons of stream avatars, but it also has various commands.

1. Rich Stream Avatars

A lot of stream avatars are integrated, Including Pokemon, Digimons, Doreamon shimeji, PSPSPSCats and other series,it is still updating.

2. Fun Twitch Interaction

Viewers can control these stream avatars by command. stream avatars can walk, run, and climb around walls on the desktop, and you can drag and drop pets with the mouse, or use tools to tease each stream avatar

coming soon

  • More live broadcast platform support, such as youtube, facebook, trovo~
  • More custom stream avatars
  • Twitch bits support, make more money for you

Come and experience it

join us: https://discord.gg/RH48pUXqTK
